subtopics.title: HTML Basics
subtopics.content:
# HTML Basics

Introduction to HTML5 tags, semantic markup, and document structure. Learn how to create well-structured web pages and accessible content.

**You will learn:**
- `<!doctype html>` and page structure
- Semantic elements like `<header>`, `<main>`, `<nav>`, `<footer>`

```html
<!doctype html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>My Page</title>
  </head>
  <body>
    <header>Site header</header>
  </body>
</html>
```

subtopics.title: CSS Styling
subtopics.content:
## CSS Styling

Master CSS selectors, the box model, flexbox, and grid. Create beautiful responsive layouts and learn how to structure CSS files.

**Topics covered:**
- Selectors & specificity
- Box model (margin, border, padding)
- Flexbox basics
- Grid for two-dimensional layouts

State Management
subtopics.content:
## State Management

`useState`, `useEffect`, and simple state patterns. When to lift state up vs local state.

**Example:**
```jsx
const [count, setCount] = useState(0);
```
